Title(s): A Mournyng Song of the Loue of God
_description: ‘A Mournyng Song of the Loue of God’ — thirty-two 8-line stanzas

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
TO loue I chulle be ginneIhesu boþe day and
                    niht…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…fful dreri is here monÞi pyne is al þe
                    mare
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: A Mournyng song Of þe loue of God (f. 299vb)

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
To loue Ichulle bi ginneIhesu Boþe day and
                    niht…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…fful dreri is heore monÞi pyne is al þe
                    mare
BLAdd22283.Note:
The ‘o’ of the first line (second letter) is almost entirely
                    overpainted by the illuminated initial ‘T’. Followed without break
                    by 2818
